scheduled_maintenances.name: [EU/CA][VMware Private Cloud] - vRealize Operations (vRops) maintenance notification

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed vSphere offer. Start time : 28/04/2025 07:00 UTC End time : 30/04/2025 16:00 UTC Service impact : vRops will be unavailable during the maintenance. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for vRealize Operations (vRops). Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. Start time : 28/04/2025 07:00 UTC End time : 30/04/2025 16:00 UTC Service impact : You may experience a micro cut if the customer is writing a lot on the zpool. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our teams will perform filer transfers. Thank you for your understanding.

affected_components.name: Managed VMware Cloud Director || ERI - Storage

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. Start time : 29/04/2025 06:30 UTC End time : 29/04/2025 21:00 UTC Service impact : You may experience micro cuts during maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update for multiple storage servers.. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. This may temporarily affect availability. Start time : 05/05/2025 07:00 UTC End time : 07/05/2025 15:00 UTC Service impact : vSphere not accesible for 1h and hosts will be put in maintenance mode during the maintenance and a vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for vSphere offer. An individual communication will be done to inform customers and you can reschedule through the manager. Thank you for your understanding

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.
